pullRequest.title: Throw unused import error along with semantic errors
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

To fix the error of unused import is not thrown when modules consist of other semantic errors.

Fixes #21878
Approach

Reset the error count before compiling each module

Suggested labels
Area/BuildTools
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide

 Added necessary tests

 Ballerina By Example Tests

 Added necessary documentation

 Ballerina By Examples

commit.message: Throw unused import error along with semantic errors

nodes.bodyText: IMO this should be added after this.compilerDriver.compilePackage(pkgNode) where we need to reset after compile code.
IMO we do not need to reset if pkgNode does not compile
